entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
